title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build serverless chatbots using Amazon ElastiCache & Aurora PostgreSQL (DAT314)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon ElastiCache 和 Aurora PostgreSQL 构建无服务器聊天机器人 (DAT314)
abstract: In this session, learn how to build a serverless-first chatbot application by leveraging Amazon Aurora with pgvector as a vector store and Amazon ElastiCache Serverless for Valkey to manage chat history, semantic caching, and agent memory. Discover how to harness these services to create contextually aware, scalable chatbots with agentic capabilities that retain conversational memory across interactions. Explore architectural patterns, implementation strategies, and real-world use cases. Gain insights into optimizing query latency, performance, and cost-effectiveness. Whether you’re a developer, architect, or decision-maker, this session equips you with practical knowledge to build modern, serverless-powered chatbot applications using generative AI.
abstract_cn: 在本次会议中，学习如何通过利用带有pgvector的Amazon Aurora作为向量存储和Amazon ElastiCache Serverless for Valkey来管理聊天历史、语义缓存和代理内存，构建无服务器优先的聊天机器人应用程序。了解如何利用这些服务创建具有上下文感知能力的可扩展聊天机器人，具备代理功能，能够在交互过程中保持对话记忆。探索架构模式、实施策略和实际用例。深入了解如何优化查询延迟、性能和成本效益。无论您是开发人员、架构师还是决策者，本次会议都将为您提供使用生成式AI构建现代无服务器驱动聊天机器人应用程序的实用知识。
